name: Samoa French Toasts
description: Easy to prep up and fun to serve. Allergen Information: Dairy, egg, corn, soy, nut free.
recipeIngredient: 1 Tablespoon raw sugar or maple syrup
1/3 cup warm water ( or almond milk or coconut milk)
1-2 teaspoons organic canola or coconut oil
4-5  dates soaked in water for atleast 15 minutes.
1/4 cup or as needed shredded dried coconut

recipeInstructions.text: Mix 1.5 Tablespoons finely ground Oats, 1 Tablespoon finely ground flax seed, 1 Tablespoon raw sugar or maple syrup, 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/3+ cup warm water or almond milk (coconut milk). Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes. Mix again, dip slices and pan fry them on medium-low, in 1-2 teaspoons organic canola or coconut oil. 3-4 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix 1.5 Tablespoons finely ground Oats, 1 Tablespoon finely ground flax seed, 1 Tablespoon raw sugar or maple syrup, 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/3+ cup warm water or almond milk (coconut milk). Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes. Mix again, dip slices and pan fry them on medium-low, in 1-2 teaspoons organic canola or coconut oil. 3-4 minutes each side.

itemListElement.text: Blend the following into a smooth flowy paste; dates, agave and 1 Tablespoon or so water to get a spreadable consistency.
itemListElement.name: Blend the following into a smooth flowy paste; dates, agave and 1 Tablespoon or so water to get a spreadable consistency.

itemListElement.text: Add 1/4 cup or as needed shredded dried coconut to a pan on low-medium heat. Roast, stirring occasionally, for 2-3 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Add 1/4 cup or as needed shredded dried coconut to a pan on low-medium heat. Roast, stirring occasionally, for 2-3 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Top the prepared French Toast with Date caramel as thick a layer as you want, then toasted coconut and then drizzle some melted chocolate. Done! Serve!
itemListElement.name: Top the prepared French Toast with Date caramel as thick a layer as you want, then toasted coconut and then drizzle some melted chocolate. Done! Serve!

keywords: dessert french toasts, easy breakfast, vegan french toasts
